attributes.action: That Gordon Brown should appear before the Chilcott Enquiry BEFORE the General Election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: That Gordon Brown appear before the Chicott enquiry and give evidence on oath as to his involement in the decision to go to war in 2003

rejection.details: It is up to the independent inquiry committee to decide who to call to give evidence, and when that evidence should be given.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
